name: HubSpot Contact Enrichment with Lusha Auto-Lookup
description:
Automatically enrich HubSpot contacts with missing data using Lusha. Searches for contacts needing enrichment, finds additional contact details, and updates HubSpot records with emails, phones, and company info.
How it works:
1. Searches HubSpot for contacts missing key data (email, phone, company details)
2. Uses Lusha to find additional contact information based on available data
3. Updates the original HubSpot contact record with enriched details
4. Processes contacts efficiently while preserving existing data

Perfect for:
- Sales teams wanting complete contact profiles
- Marketing teams building comprehensive contact databases
- Lead qualification and contact scoring workflows
- Maintaining clean, enriched CRM data automatically

Key benefits:
- Only processes contacts that actually need enrichment
- Preserves all existing HubSpot data and properties
- Automatic data validation and formatting
- Scheduled or triggered execution options

Setup requirements:
- HubSpot CRM access with contact permissions
- Lusha API access for contact lookup
- Contacts with at least name + company or LinkedIn profile

The template includes smart filtering to avoid unnecessary API calls and ensures your HubSpot data stays clean and up-to-date with the latest contact information.
